Standing guard was the most exciting job ever, more exciting than blowing a=
way Maximals, that's for sure! Psuedo starts to think, should he tell Atma =
about his former life? It would give him a partner in case Deemos came back=
. He decided he had better not, he could defend himself now, no matter how =
big Deemos' army was! Deemos probably didn't even have 3 bots in his army!.=
..

Atma thought about HIS former life, training to become a Predacon gener=
al, they gave him the position as a General, so he came to Neo Beast Wars t=
o be a General and be treated like a second in command. (Read, not BE secon=
d in command, be treated like one) They rejected him from that, and he had =
guard duty. He started to wonder if the Maximals needed a soldier, that wou=
ld make the Preds wish the treated him better...
